I didn't even see those, sorry. I'll repost.

::Dachande/Battera::

    Bat=
tera spoke, as she really wanted peace. "Yes, we will help you. Right Dacha=
nde?"
    Dachande looked at her. He knew that Magmatron would object, but =
he also wanted peace. This place needed it. And maybe the only way to achiv=
e that peace was through talking, maybe it was Magmatron's way. He wasn't s=
ure. "Peace talks? I could be dismantled, lose everything, and I really lik=
e fighting, but your right, it's just to good. I'm in. But remember, Magmat=
ron does control part of me."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Allor=
an2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 =
12:03 AM
  Subject: To Dachande


  OOC: Dachande, Vulois DID respond to th=
em!  I posted it three times!  You are 
  the one not responding! Vulois ex=
plained to Dachande and Battera his new 
  plan.  He was going to return to=
 the peace talks, but this time they'd all go 
  together to prevent mishap=
s.  He asked if they accepted.  Please respond to 
  me. I really want this=
 to work out. 

  :::Starscream/Sideswipe/Torca/Ratchet/Falcon/Snare/The De=
strocons::: 

  ::Starscream follows suit, arming his guns and aiming them =
at the bush:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sideswipe grins from ear to ear as he is finall=
y able to see his opponent.  
  The smile immeadiatly disapeers from his fa=
ce as he gets hit by the missle.  
  he fires 2 missles and 25 shots at Dou=
ble Punch:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Torca was hit by the missle, and gets hit by 2 st=
inger missles.  He fired 9 
  nails at Double Punch, 8 at Injector, and 8 a=
t Bumblebee:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Ratchet was hit by 2 ion disks in the foot and =
1 in the chest.  he 
  transformed into beast mode, which had all the weapo=
n benefits of robot mode, 
  only with better armor.  He raised his tusks a=
nd flapped open his ears, and 
  fired 15 shots from each gun and 2 tusk mi=
ssles at Manterror:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Destrons hear Shredder's order.  they=
 were releived, because if they 
  waited any longer the ship would prbably=
 be collapsing around them!:: 
  Ramjet: ya dont have to tell me twice! 
  =
::They transform into beast and vehicle modes and fly after Shredder:: 
   =
     eGroups Sponsor
